tags: Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services
full_summary:
# Building Condition Reports – Moncton and Charlottetown
Revision: 1
Publication Date: January 12, 2023
Closes: January 26, 2023 2:00 p.m. EST

## Solicitation Overview
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking proposals from qualified pre-qualified firms under the Architecture and Interior Design Supply Arrangement, E0225-152290, for the development of Building Condition Reports at locations in New Brunswick and Prince Edward Island.

## Contract Details
### Identified Requirements
* Development of Building Condition Reports
* Design and reporting at locations in New Brunswick and Prince Edward Island
* Delivery within specified deadlines
* Services tailored to the needs of Correctional Services Canada (CSC)

### Procurement Category
Construction
Procurement Method: Competitive Selective Tendering

## Evaluation Criteria
Firms will be evaluated on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Proposal Process
A pre-qualified shortlist of firms has been identified. Only these firms will be considered for shortlisting and evaluation.

## Evaluation Details
For more details on the evaluation process and selection criteria, please refer to the tender evaluation document.

## Eligibility Requirements
To be eligible to bid on this solicitation, firms must:
* Be pre-qualified under the Architecture and Interior Design Supply Arrangement, E0225-152290
* Meet the category-specific criteria outlined in Appendix B of the Supply Arrangement

## Important Information
- The solicitation will close on January 26, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST. Late submissions will be rejected.
- Firms will be asked to submit a Statement of Capabilities (SOC) and a detailed price proposal.

## Contracting Authority
The identified contractor must have a regular business location in Canada and must have been in operation for a minimum of 5 years.

## Contact Information
For more information related to this solicitation, please contact:
Richard Parsons
Public Services and Procurement Canada
Email: [richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: [insert phone number]
Fax: [insert fax number]
Address:
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage,
Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
Canada

---

Please let me know if you have any further questions or if you would like to make any further
